lead_paragraph: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola has said Kevin de Bruyne's hamstring problem is "not a big injury" and believes the midfielder could return to action in around three weeks.

headline.print_headline: Guardiola Hopeful of De Bruyne Return in Three Weeks
headline.main: Guardiola Hopeful of De Bruyne Return in Three Weeks
